about_the_game:
Welcome, do come in, we were waiting for you! This is the official tERRORbane soundtrack!

More than 40 tracks, for a bit over one hour of total play time of pure buggy, glitchy goodness! Composed by the two founding brothers of BitNine Studio, Matteo and Andrea Leoni, in collaboration with artist Daniele 'Elrehon' Coppola!

Relive a crazy and nostalgia-fueled voyage through the atmospheres and environments of the game, while you try to piece together the many audio cues and nods to great soundtracks of videogame yore our authors have lined their musical creations with. We even included some bonus tracks! The only thing missing is a digital little umbrella really, what are you waiting for?!
